scsf
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Simple features and the spatial zoo
  • News

Common path forms.

Paths.

# S3 method for sf
sc_path(x, ids = NULL, ...)

# S3 method for sfc
sc_path(x, ids = NULL, ...)

# S3 method for MULTIPOLYGON
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for POLYGON
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for LINESTRING
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for MULTILINESTRING
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for POINT
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for MULTIPOINT
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for GEOMETRYCOLLECTION
sc_path(x, ...)

Arguments

x

simple features object
ids

object id, one for each object in the `sfc`
...

arguments to methods

Examples

library(scsf)
#sf_dataset <- sf::st_sf(geometry = sf::st_sfc(sfzoo[[2]]), a = 1)
#PATH(sf_dataset)
#sc_path(sf::st_sfc(sfzoo))
#sc_path(sf::st_sfc(sfzoo))
sc_path(sfzoo$multipolygon)
#> # A tibble: 5 x 5
#>    nrow  ncol         type subobject     path
#>   <int> <int>        <chr>     <int>    <chr>
#> 1     6     2 MULTIPOLYGON         1 e6889d79
#> 2     4     2 MULTIPOLYGON         1 4cc0a0d2
#> 3     5     2 MULTIPOLYGON         2 6de2e9d9
#> 4     5     2 MULTIPOLYGON         2 b9900610
#> 5     4     2 MULTIPOLYGON         3 82c4a2fc
sc_path(sfzoo$polygon)
#> # A tibble: 2 x 4
#>    nrow  ncol    type     path
#>   <int> <int>   <chr>    <chr>
#> 1     6     2 POLYGON c0a4ae63
#> 2     4     2 POLYGON 4f2928a8
sc_path(sfzoo$linestring)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 4
#>    nrow  ncol       type     path
#>   <int> <int>      <chr>    <chr>
#> 1     4     2 LINESTRING f58daca8
sc_path(sfzoo$multilinestring)
#> # A tibble: 3 x 4
#>    nrow  ncol            type     path
#>   <int> <int>           <chr>    <chr>
#> 1     4     2 MULTILINESTRING 4c61d03d
#> 2     4     2 MULTILINESTRING 164a0830
#> 3     2     2 MULTILINESTRING c8ea21c0
sc_path(sfzoo$point)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 4
#>    nrow  ncol  type     path
#>   <dbl> <dbl> <chr>    <chr>
#> 1     1     2 POINT bbb9d5a1
sc_path(sfzoo$multipoint)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 4
#>    nrow  ncol       type     path
#>   <int> <int>      <chr>    <chr>
#> 1     6     2 MULTIPOINT 15e9a68d
sc_path(sfzoo$multipoint)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 4
#>    nrow  ncol       type     path
#>   <int> <int>      <chr>    <chr>
#> 1     6     2 MULTIPOINT 0e38c6e5
